article_title: Attorney General Scott Pruitt provides overview of state legal issues

article_metadata.description:
Oklahoma Attorney General Scott Pruitt provided an update on issues that impact human resources and then provided bonus material during the combined meetings of the Southern Oklahoma Leaders Lunch and Ardmore Personnel Roundtable.
Speaking before a full house, Pruitt discussed the conflict between regulations and regulatory powers that his office has been addressing.
“Regulations should never be used to pick winners and losers,” he said.
Pruitt said the importance of regulations is
article_metadata.author: Michael Pineda
